title: Mastery 6 token bug

embed.description: This album is really big! It's going to take us a bit to get your download ready for you. Enter your email and we will notify you when it's ready. Once ready, it will be available for up to 24 hours.

body: Yesterday i was play sion and was level 5 and then i got a level 6 mastery token, i know how the system works but later that day i was playing lee sin and had him level 4. at the end of the game when we won, i levelled up to level 5, i also got an s on lee sin. along with that a pop up came up and said that i got a mastery level 6 token for lee sin, i thought this was kind of weird that it worked like that but i was happy (:. but i went into my hex tech thing and it only shows my sion level 6 token?? wondering if u could help me out riots <3

replies.body: same thing happened to me today
Yeah it hapened the same thing to me today i leveled to 5 with yasuo and i got a token but in my loot inv i only have my mastery 7 token for zed can you check that out for me please?
This is a weird one because I actually am able to see the token in your inventory when I looked into your account. Has the token appeared on your account since you logged back in?

Hey there,

Not sure if this is related but there is [currently an issue with mastery tokens not dropping under certain circumstance, this is known and a fix is being worked on.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208872326--May-20-We-re-aware-of-an-issue-that-occasionally-prevents-mastery-token-drops-We-re-aiming-to-resolve-this-in-patch-6-11)
